channel.title: my work on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in my work on Barefoot Rob

item.title: mens circle process
item.description: 10:59 Thursday 19 July 2018 JST Tonight I chose to work on my anger related to things not going my way. Anger: why is this person standing blocking the escalator keeping people from going up? Anger: why would R-san not trust a professional wine taster that he knows how to taste wine without getting drunk? Anger: why would A-san suggest popcorn style for people to speak up instead of just asking each person?
